content: good morning starshine and imma keep shinin a 2 in 1 crochet square pattern by chupi original colorway tri-color colorway the introduction to this designs creation after going through a dark period in my life i decided to go live on tiktok for about an hour on halloween 2024 i had barely picked up a crochet hook for the entire month of october but i felt like making a square that day for a project i have going on unsure of what to do i just started making a circle once i started to see how i could form a sun though that s when i found my crojo & my soul lit on fire once more i have to give a proper shout out to rojo one of my good friends for motivating me and cheering me on to write this design into a pattern as he kept saying he wanted to make it himself it took me 3 days to get the design just right i realized that some people may only be interested in the sunny looking part and that s why this is a 2 in 1 square design you can stop after round 10 to have the sun stand out or continue making the whole square for a more stained glass type look either way i hope that you enjoy this pattern as much as i do the tinier sunny square i titled good morning starshine this comes from a special person very dear to me …they know who they are i love you and i thank you from the bottom of my heart and soul for being a true friend when i needed one in the worst way imaginable keep being a shining light because the world needs more people like you in it the larger square i titled imma keep shinin there s this hat i designed back in 2023 that has a sun also the original thought behind the making of that hat was that i had a sunny disposition on life so when i started crocheting this square and envisioned another sun in the design it just felt right to incorporate a name tying the 2 suns together no matter how dark life sometimes becomes i will always remember that i brighten the lives of others i have had many people refer to me as sunshine… so imma keep shinin
